Line1.3F392: Here I stand in the sight of Heaven and renounce the Light from my heart. Wretched, I was born of sin... and to sin I commit my soul.
Line3.3F392: Accept my blood, O Lord of Hatred, and guide me as thy servant... into the darkness, eternal.
VoiceDir1.3F392: Broken. Tearful. Hesitating. A forced confession.
VoiceDir3.3F392: Broken. Tearful. Hesitating. A forced confession.
